Description:
Quiet, light-filled, convenient
This sunlight-flooded apartment offers security, peace and an easy low maintenance lifestyle in a leafy cul-de-sac convenient to North and Grange roads buses and to Ormond station, cafes and shops, as well as to recreation, reserves, and schools, handy to Monash Uni (Clayton and Caulfield campuses) and to Glenhuntly Road trams. Description:
Elegant 1890's Residence in the McKinnon College/GRZ1 Zone (597sqm)
Grand proportions, double-fronted period elegance and a premier GRZ1 position are the hallmarks that place this 1890's Classic as the best opportunity in the McKinnon College Zone.
A testament to magnificent century old architecture with high decorative ceilings, cast iron fireplaces, leadlight windows, and rich timberwork, this stately home has been sympathetically extended to offer an extensive three-bedroom, two-bathroom floorplan featuring grand original rooms, a cathedral-ceilinged family zone & a timeless Tasmanian Oak timber kitchen (with vintage wood stove as a feature).
Quality appointed with state-of-the-art Smeg appliances and a garden-accessed master-suite, this centrally heated and fan cooled home features broad lawned gardens beyond paved outdoor entertaining, 19kw solar system, a designated veggie patch to indulge a green thumb, 3 separate water tanks and a fitted storage shed.
Set on 597sqm approx. of prime McKinnon Zone land with a long tandem carport to fit the family fleet, move right in and appreciate this time-honoured treasure.
Alternatively, capitalise on General Residential 1 Zoning and bring your vision for multi-unit, multi-level (10.5m) development on a grand scale (subject to council approval).
Positioned between Joyce Park and Ormonds transformed station and shopping strip, a stroll to prestigious Primary Schools and the College and an easy commute to Bayside. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER

Architectural, Accommodating & In-Zone Mckinnon SC
A superior example of the Art Deco era with period charm as a backdrop to contemporary design, this palatial up to six-bedroom, three-bathroom home goes above and beyond its original base to offer formal, family, first floor and fresco living on a grand scale.

Villa living is the way to go
Towards the rear of a development of only 4 homes, this villa has been refurbished so that it is modern, bright and comfortable - just what you want to ensure a low maintenance lifestyle. Description:
A Delightful Period Cottage
If you love the thought of period living and want an easy life, do not compromise with this low maintenance allotment! Whether starting out, downsizing or simply investing, this renovated front home allows you to live the period character dream in an affordable way.
Recently renovated with open living in mind, this delightful cottage offers up to three bedrooms, or two plus a separate dining or an office. The original lounge flows through to a tiled north-facing, informal dining area which, in turn, adjoins streamlined stone kitchen with elite Miele and Asko appliances. There is also a central, state-of-the-art stone-finished bathroom with the latest designer black tapware.
All the improvements are respectful of the original detail including beautiful Baltic pine floorboards, lofty deep corniced ceilings and vintage light fittings and cabinetry. This classic Californian Bungalow style home also has the contemporary comforts including alarm, ducted heating and reverse-cycle air-conditioning.
Set in lawn-free, easy to maintain landscaped surroundings, there is a high-gabled carport at the front and a fully-decked entertainers' courtyard to the rear. A stylish beauty in the McKinnon school zone ...with schools and shopping strips close and bus-routes in all directions.
